Creates a new edge running from vertex v0 to v1.

Parameters:
v0 -
v1 -
f0 - Left face, the face that lies to the left while travelling from v0 to v1.
f1 - Right face
e0plus - Next edge from v0 which is farther in the counterclockwise (+) direction than edge e0minus.
e0minus - Next edge from v0 which is farther in the clockwise (-) direction than e0plus.
e1plus - Next edge from v1.
e1minus - Next edge from v1.
